title: Question about honor.
body: When honor resets next season does it go based off what you ended the season with or ended preseason with?

replies.body: Pretty sure everyone will be reset back to Honor rank 2 for a level playing field.

Even the ones that are honor rank 0 and 1?

Seems kinda unfair to give these people a higher rank than they deserve don't you think?

Looks like Onii got back here before I could, but [**NeuroCat made a PBE post yesterday**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/HIZAeknK-honor-season-2018-on-pbe) detailing some of this so far. 

- Honor reset: Players who are levels 3+ will be reset to a checkpoint between levels 2 and 3 as follows:
 - Level 5 last season -> Level 2, Checkpoint 3
 - Level 4 last season -> Level 2, Checkpoint 2
 - Level 3 last season -> Level 2, Checkpoint 1
 - Level 2 last season -> Level 2, Checkpoint 0
 - Level 0 & 1 -> stay at current level

>
> Pretty sure everyone will be reset back to Honor rank 2 for a level playing field.

It was announced in the PBE that the honor system, will not do this for honor level 0-1. That they will stay at that. (Riot Post) What I was curious about is whether it was dependent on what I got at the end of the season or during preseason.
